Ipswich Mobile Library Route 14

Contact us:

Managers: Andrew Little and David Cook

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 263838

Route timetable

Route 14 Town/village Location Time
MIP/14A Holton St. Mary Church 1000 – 1015
MIP/14B Raydon Church 1020 – 1105
MIP/14C Lower Raydon Sulley’s Hill 1110 – 1125
MIP/14D Higham The Green 1135 – 1150
MIP/14E Stoke by Nayland Green 1200 – 1240
MIP/14F Polstead The Cock Inn 1340 – 1400
MIP/14G Polstead Whitestreet Green 1410 – 1430
MIP/14H Polstead Heath Close 1440 – 1455
MIP/14I Upper Layham Brett Green Estate 1505 – 1600

Calling every 4 weeks on Tuesdays:

2016: 5 January, 2 February, 1 March, 29 March, 26 April, 24 May, 21 June, 19 July, 16 August, 13 September, 11 October, 8 November, 6 December
